_header: This work who so shall see or read
Note: Same as stanzas 20-29 and 38, 35 of The Remedy of Love (4801) occurring separately.
Subjects: advice, to lovers; lovers, warnings to
_description: ‘Fle þe mys-woman’, with an exemplum — twelve stanzas rhyme royal

Banna.First Lines:
This work quha sa sall sie or reidOf ony Incongruitie do me not
                    Impeche…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Keip with hir at wyn no alteratiounLest that thyn hart fall
                    by inclinatioun
Banna.Attributed Author:
Chauseir (left margin, f. 258v), ffinis quod chauseir (f.
                        259v)
